Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2013 05:24PM Ackgirl72 wrote: Diagnosed from beginning stage 4 in march 2009. Three boys 2000, 2003and 2008. I am 40yrsold. Been married to the best guy for15years. Mets to bones spine, hip, rib and small spot in liver. Done three clinical trials which went well. Currently on zoleda which is making me very sick nausea, migraines and pain. Do not think I will be on it much longer due to the quality of life. Been mostly positive but last few months have been rough mentally and physically.
Posts.Title: Roll Call 2013 LilSchatzie reader123

Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2013 09:15PM Ackgirl72 wrote: I have liver and bone mets. My baby was only a year old when I was diagnosed. There are so many drugs and options. I had abalation done to my liver to remove spot. I have been kicking this almost 4 years. No ones time frame. My uncle is a dr and told me that we all have a time frame on earth but day to day no one thinks about it. We do. You have to but at the same time you need to live. Your husband is freaking out as we all do in our own way Dealing with this. When I am having a bad day I do something special w my kids. Zoo. Movies. Whatever. To see their joy makes u focus on joy too. Be strong.
Posts.Title: Liver mets & very young children tortoise M-Aug
